1: 7th at World Junior Figure Skating Championships

--------------------
Text: Maxim Bolotin:  With Oksana Domnina, he won the bronze medal at the 2002 Russian Junior Figure Skating Championships, placed 7th at the 2002 World Junior Figure Skating Championships, and placed 4th at the 2001–2002 ISU Junior Grand Prix Final.
